data.text: @gamesblazer06 so Euro Banks are going to be okay? some like $ING bank have dropped almost 40% in 1 month. I just don't get it

Then it becomes an issue of Fed v Russian CB… 

One has unlimited $DXY printers the other has its assets Frozen. 

Place your bets accordingly.

@gamesblazer06 What's the banks exposure to the agricultural business that will be shocked by the low offer of fertilizers and high oil cost. 
How many mbs will default if people who don't make ends meet and choose not to pay rent over having food to eat and gas in the truck?

Russia is nothing like Brexit.. where UK was & still is the Top Non US Country Exposure for the largest GSIBs… 

Russia didn’t even make the list of Top 20 Non US Country Exposure - for any US Bank. 

$XLF #Reflation

@gamesblazer06 Stop looking at it on a cyclical/ traditional growth model glance. Theres geopolitical entities behind the smoekscreen that can afford a war and would gladly reap the benefits of a 4th industrial turning maybe even ww3
